sentences.en: Baby, you're so gneiss I'll never take you for granite.
sentences.cn: 宝贝，你是如此的片麻岩，我永远不会把你当花岗岩的。

sentences.en: Both the eclogite and the felsic gneiss have not undergone the same high - pressure metamorphic event.
sentences.cn: 榴辉岩的主体围岩是长英质片麻岩,它与榴辉岩不是相同高压变质作用的产物.

sentences.en: Felsic gneiss is the most widely distributed rock type in Archean metamorphic complex areas.
sentences.cn: 长英质片麻岩是太古宙变质杂岩区最主要的岩石类型.

sentences.en: Gneiss, a metamorphic rock, can be commonly found in Precambrian areas.
sentences.cn: 片麻岩, 变质岩, 可以发现,在常见的前寒武纪地区.

sentences.en: Granulite - the metamorphic gneiss district level are mostly granulite facies to senior amphibolite facies.
sentences.cn: 麻粒岩-片麻岩区的变质程度多属麻粒岩相到高级角闪岩相。

sentences.en: Park from granite, gneiss, the soil is a gray forest soil, fertile soil, vegetation growing well.
sentences.cn: 公园由花岗岩 、 片麻岩构成, 土壤属灰色森林土, 土质肥沃, 植被生长良好.

sentences.en: The headrace tunnel passes mainly through Gneiss rock.
sentences.cn: 引水隧洞主要穿过片麻岩.

sentences.en: The pyroclastic rock fragments comprise quartzite, schist, gneiss, basalt , andesite, rhyolite and quartz.
sentences.cn: 火成岩的碎块成分主要为石英岩 、 岩 、 麻岩 、 武岩 、 山岩和流纹岩.

sentences.en: The types of mineralized rocks are fine grained biotite gneiss and silicalites.
sentences.cn: 矿化类型为含金黑云变粒岩型、含金硅质岩型.

sentences.en: Tour Guide: It's carved into a bedrock of granite gneiss . It's also Kinmen's primary rock formation.
sentences.cn: 导游: 是花岗片麻岩, 这种岩石也是金门主要的地质之一.

trans.tran_en: any coarse-grained metamorphic rock that is banded and foliated: represents the last stage in the metamorphism of rocks before melting
